title: Lemon Herb Fish Fillet
short_description: A simple, zesty fish dish that's light on calories but rich in flavor, ready in under 30 minutes.
ingredients: 2 fish fillets (like cod or tilapia, about 150g each)

steps.title: Prepare Ingredients
steps.description: Preheat oven to 200C. Season the fish fillets with salt and pepper. Slice the lemon, reserve two slices and juice the rest.

steps.title: Marinate Fish
steps.description: In a small bowl, mix olive oil, half of the lemon juice, minced garlic, and parsley. Place fish fillets on a baking dish, pour marinade over them and top each with a lemon slice.

steps.title: Bake
steps.description: Bake in the preheated oven for about 12 to 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Drizzle remaining lemon juice over cooked fish and garnish with additional parsley. Serve hot.
